Class GapFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • GapFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GapFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The GapFinder class is a Filter that sends all of the sequences of bases separated. The Filter's job is to add bases (A, T, C, or G) to the sequence, cut off the sequence if a gap is found (N), and ignore all other characters.
